title: Moonwanker
author: Moonwanker
content: It seems the presale went pretty well for this and they're certainly doing a good job of marketing it so far. Has anyone invested in Tamadoge or have any thoughts on it?I couldn't see anything posted about it here

comments.author: Novita
comments.body: Quote from: Moonwanker on September 20, 2022, 02:55:55 AMIt seems the presale went pretty well for this and they're certainly doing a good job of marketing it so far. Has anyone invested in Tamadoge or have any thoughts on it?I couldn't see anything posted about it here the hottest new Tamadoge meme coin and provides a detailed forecast of where the $TAMA token could end up from 2022 to 2030

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Moonwanker on September 20, 2022, 02:55:55 AMIt seems the presale went pretty well for this and they're certainly doing a good job of marketing it so far. Has anyone invested in Tamadoge or have any thoughts on it?I couldn't see anything posted about it here Well, if their presale went very well. Congratulations to them.But nobody is aware of what can happen when it's already launched. Since it's just the presale, everyone who invested has to wait except the developers who has a full access to the market of it at any time.I've just seen some project lately that has been introduced well in the market a few months ago and within 10 minutes after the launching just this day, it went to -95%.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Memecoin is a 'meme' coin, no matter how you look at it. If I'm not mistaken, there's still no utility for this one likewise with other cryptos of the same category. Most of the time, coins of such are only good for a short period of time, and once the hype cools down, it will have a hard time to be back on its feet unlike with utility tokens and the others which has specific functions. But to be clear, I am not ignoring the fact that it could really be profitable to invest, what I am trying to say is to take extra caution with betting your money to tokens or investments. Goal is to lessen the risk of losing in an investment.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: In this bear market memecoin should be the last thing anyone should invest money on, find strong layer 1 projects and layer 2 projects you will be happy with this decision right away after market starts to recover, a meme coin will always be meme coin and as for me its just money grabbing project.
